document_data.caption: A map Moonfall Ridge showing near Aithelar.
document_data.name: Moonfall Ridge
document_data.mainbody: '''Moonfall Ridge''' was a clifface overlooking the town of [[Aithelar]] in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on [[Alaron]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Geography: Moonfall Ridge was found directly north of Aithelar, beginning on the coast of the [[Sea of Moonshae]] and passing east until ending near the edge of the [[Dernall Forest]]. A trail passed through a small pass through the cliff's eastern side that led to a quarry.
